entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
